name: arrayContains
description: Used to determine if a value is in the given array, case-sensitive. Adobe CF and OpenBD return boolean. Lucee / Railo returns the numeric index if the value is found, 0 if not.

params.name: array
params.description: The array in which to search.

params.name: value
params.description: The value to search for in the array.

params.name: substringMatch
params.description: Lucee4.5+ If set to true then a substring match will also return an array position. This will only work with simple values. Passing true with complex objects will throw an exception.

lucee.notes: Returns the position of the array instead of boolean value.

examples.title: Substring Search
